item.description:
Grilled Korean beef ribs at Andong Ribs Street

Andong Alley Hidden restaurant, where have you been?

Andong City, Gyeongbuk, Korea

I miss the taste of the warm hometown in the season of hanging the collar in the cold wind. Let's go to Andong, a city where delicious local food is delicious. From Andong Steamed Chicken, Andong Hutje Ssap, Andong Gan mackerel, you can taste unimaginable food except for Andong, and there are many hidden restaurants. Grilled ribs, seonji gukbap, and gyeongsangdo-style chueotang, which will confirm the reputation of Andong Korean beef, are lined by Andongguksi and Naengwoodong, the culmination of lightness. The pilgrimage to Andong restaurant with history and tradition starts from the rib street in front of Andong Station.
5 hidden restaurants that are proven by tradition and taste
When planning a trip, searching for restaurants is a must-have course. When you search for Andong restaurants, Andong jjimdak in the old market jjimdak alley appears first, and the Andong Dam Wolyeonggyo traditional food street, the famous ‘Gakjipjipji’, and the Andong Ganjeok that can be found anywhere in Andong. In search, I asked the natives of Andong, who weren't in the castle, a hidden restaurant that was verified by history, tradition, and taste in addition to Andong's three major delicacies.
'Okya Restaurant''s Seonji Gukbap
Grilled Korean beef ribs at Andong Rib alley in front of Andong Station, and Sunji Gukbap of 'Okya Restaurant' in Andong New Market Food Alley, Cold Udon with 34-year old tradition, Gyeongsangdo Chueotang, Hahoe From the farmhouse guest house near the village to Andong-guk-si, which is made by the villagers, we received fifty hidden restaurants that everyone who knows and knows and visits. When traveling to Andong, if you have this much menu, no matter where you go or who you are, you don't have any problem.
Andong Geonjin Noodles of “Park Jae-sook Farmer Homestay”
Two special services on Korean beef ribs
If you go in front of Andong Station, there is Andong Ribs Alley. Thirty years ago, it started with one or two ribs, not to mention ribs, but it has been growing one by one, and 15 ribs are now in business. Andong-style seasoned ribs are soy sauce seasoned with fresh garlic and fruit juice, and are served at the same time as the order, so you have to use good ribs. So, of course, it is fresh and delicious.
Grilled Korean beef ribs at 'New Seoul Ribs'
After eating the charcoal-grilled ribs, you can enjoy the spicy rib stew and spicy rib stew. It's best cooked on a charcoal fire and cooked with spicy ribs after removing the meat on a rib that can't be burned or chewy. Even if you choose chewy ribs and eat the rice with the remaining seasoning, it is also delicious. The miso stew, boiled with soybean paste soaked in the countryside, is delicious when eaten with a soft, savory siraegi on rice, and when you eat a cool soup, the feeling of ribs disappears. It is enough to eat 2 servings of 3 people because it is 200g to the bones per serving.
Steamed spicy ribs served as a service on Korean beef ribs
Business Hours 10: 00 ~ 22: 00, Open year round, Korean beef seasoned ribs 200g 22,000 won.
Siraegi miso soup that blows the feeling
Seonjigukbap with a yukgaejang visual with plenty of beef and green onions
Okya Restaurant, located in Anjak Alley, in Andong New Market, is a restaurant that has been boiling Seonjiguk Rice for 50 years. Until it is highly praised by the national rice enthusiasts as the best soup in the country, the broth of Okya Restaurant is boiled constantly, with plenty of Andong Hanwoo's noodles such as Yangji, Satae, and Seonji. The visual is rich in beef, spicy red pepper oil, sweet radish, and green onions, but it's a simple name, Seonjigukbap. The trade name “Andong Siyeonghalmae Sunjik Gukbap” used the sign of a municipal butcher operated by Okya Restaurant. As I was at a meat store, I was able to boil soup with a lot of delicious meat.
Seonji Gukbap
Add a pot full of Andong Korean beef bones and meat, and simmer the cabbage, green onion, and sesame seeds in savory broth. The shop, which started with one square, continues to expand to the side, but the waiting time becomes longer in winter. The shabby interior where the traces of the old buildings remain are in harmony with the taste of a bowl of soup. Adding soup, meat and rice is unlimited. A combination of illusion that makes the bowl of soup cooked every day, sour mixed, and red bean paste pickled in a bowl.
Put the brisket, landslide, and green onion in a cauldron and simmer.
Business hours 08: 00 ~ 20: 00, closed on the day of the holiday, Seonjigukbap 8,000 won.
A delicious table topped with sweet and sour mix and red pepper paste
Andong Geonjin Noodles cooked by a grandmother with red sesame seeds
Rumors are good, but the most difficult food to eat is Andong Geonjin Noodles. In Andong city, there are several noodle shops that serve dried noodles, but if you go to 'Park Jae-sook Farmer's House' on the way to Hahoe Village, you can taste the dried noodles. In a traditional way, the dough mixed with flour and soy flour is pushed with red sesame seeds, boiled in boiling water, dried, and then dried. Konjin noodles are perfect for summer, but they are always a favorite for those who like noodles.
The owner puts anchovy, radish, onion, and kelp into the seaweed twice a week to boil the broth with care. The pumpkin, kimchi, grated flour, and sesame seeds are gently softened, and the soft noodles are soft. It feels plain, but the soup is so deep that it is impossible to give up the last melody.
Rustic country side dishes and dried noodles
Business hours 09: 00 ~ 18: 00, closed on national holidays, Konjin noodles 7,000 won.
Boil broth twice a week
Gyeongsang-do chueotang, boiled with fresh local food
'Gyeongsangdo Chueotang', located in the food street of Andong City, is hidden in an alley. A traditional kitchen in a restaurant that has been renovated. Boiled hot water is boiled for 24 hours in a traditional cauldron on an old buttock. The two are running together, but the pride in Gyeongsangdo Chueotang is great. Uiseong garlic, nutritious red pepper powder, and green cabbage grown in Andong are boiled with natural loach, so it is delicious. The loach is boiled in a cauldron, crushed in a colander to filter out the bones and intestines, and then put plenty of green cabbage to preserve the sweetness.
Gyeongsangdo-style chueotang with a cool taste like clear miso soup
Chueotang is a refreshing and refreshing but richly rich protein, calcium, and mineral like a cabbage soup boiled with a little miso. People in Gyeongsang-do eat herbs with scented herbs such as zephyr and scented leaves in a chueotang that tastes better when the cold wind starts to blow. On a day when there are many customers packing, chueotang may drop. Phone check required in the evening.
Chueotang boiling in a cauldron
Business hours 10: 00 ~ 20: 30, closed on holidays, Chuotang costs 8,000 won.
Sweet and soft chueotang with green cabbage
Udon noodles with light and plain memories
'Shinseon Sikdang', which continues the tradition with only one udon in one place, is a restaurant lined up in summer. Cold noodle and bibimbap, jajangmyeon and udon, loved by all seasons, steadily gather noodle enthusiasts. Cold udon, the best menu of Sinseon Restaurant, has a cool taste that is loved by the morning sun.
A cool cold udon loved by the four seasons
The first taste of the cold udon noodles that rolls the thick wheat noodles in anchovy broth boiled in a clear and light taste is boring. This is thanks to the broth that boils with anchovies that have been airborne in Yeosu for 34 years. However, the more you eat, the cooler the soup will be, so you will continue to eat it. The only garnishes are Danmu Jichae, Cucumber, and Kim powder. Bibim Udon, with cabbage and red pepper paste added, also has a nice, unpretentious taste. Even regulars who have visited Shinseon Restaurant for more than 30 years can't forget the neat taste of noodles.
Jjajang Udon made with only vegetables
Business hours 07: 00 ~ 20: 00, closed irregularly (phone check required), cold udon ubibibi udon 4,000 won each.
Bibim Udon with a spicy sauce that goes well with the hot noodles

item.title: A good fairy tale is better than a hundred sermons, Andong - Andong, Gyeongbuk, Korea
item.description:
Mr. Kwon Jeong-seon, the author of The Puppy

A good fairy tale is better than a hundred sermons, Andong

Andong, Gyeongbuk, Korea

As you raise your child, you may remember reading the fairy tale book, Puppy Dung once. Or watched the anime Puppy. . It's a fairy tale telling us that a bunch of tiny dog poops are useful, and that anything in the world is worth living. Kwon Jung-seon, the author of The Puppy, passed away a few years ago, but his works are still a small hope of fire in this immaculate world. I visited the house where the teacher's harvest remained, the church where the bell was kept, and Kwon Jung-saeng's fairy tale country, which opened last summer.

Legacy Left to Poor Children
Kwon Jeong-sa, a fairy tale called Kwon Jeong-sa, is a renovated elementary school. It shows records and major works about Kwon Jeong-saeng.
Kwon Jung-saeng Fairy Tale Country with Kwon Jung-saeng's Life and Works
The teacher was born in Japan in 1937. I was the sixth of five sons and two daughters between my father and my poor mother who were taken to labor. After returning to World War II in Japan, he went through the Korean War and felt the misery of the war. Poverty and war lead families to break up, eat and not be treated properly, and suffer from systemic tuberculosis. Young Kwon, Jung-saeng, who was unjust to die, wanted to leave a good book.
Teacher's main works
The dog-dung, which endured a painful body, was elected to the Children's Literature Awards and continued to write with the meaning of life. Nevertheless, he never suffered a health recovery and suffered from illness all the time. In addition to The Puppy, the novel Mongsil Sister, whose main character was Mong Mong-yi, who suffered poverty and war and did not lose humanity, was also loved by many. In addition, there were 『Rangrang Star Geelongrong』 published as a book only after being written in the monthly magazine until the beginning of his death. He has made numerous works such as Flower Garden of Badger's House, Uncle Bear and Opundol, and Hantijae Sky.
A dog manuscript handwritten manuscript
After the teacher passed away in 2007, he was amazed at how to organize his belongings. It is because the balance of the account book left by the teacher has reached 1 billion won. The less people eat, the less they wear, the less they use their lives, the people in the neighborhood thought they were just poor writers. What he cherished and cherished for himself was to feed the poor and naked children of the world and to read. So he asked that the legacy and future taxes be used for children in North Korea, Africa and the Middle East. "All the books I have written are mostly bought and read by the children, so the incentives from them should be returned to the children."
One verse and the first edition of Puppy
There are some artifacts that stand out from the exhibition hall. A fan made of folded waste fertilizer bags and a lamp made out of wicks in a mayonnaise glass bottle when there was no electricity can give a glimpse into the life of a teacher.
Debt made of fertilizer bags
On one side of the exhibition hall, the landscape of the teacher's house in Jotap-dong was reproduced. All of the items inside are relics, but at first glance, nothing looks expensive. The bookcase and the sitting desk are all furniture, and the room is small enough for one person to lie down. The teacher himself wrote, “A good fairy tale is better than a hundred sermons.”
The room where the teacher lived inside the exhibition hall
In front of the cylinder in which the main works were held, the film shows the main scenes of the animation <Doggy Time> and the contents related to the teacher. Although it is short, it is possible to know the teacher's life and thoughts.
Visitors watching teacher related videos
If you go out from the entrance on the first floor, there is a deck observation deck. The village shown here is the background of the village where Mong Shil lived in the novel, Mong Sil Sister.
The town behind the dream sister
If you go down the stairs, you can find a dog poop, a mother's puppet, and Mong Sil's sculptures.
Sister
Teacher's house and church bell tower

10 minutes by car from the fairy tale country is the house where Mr. Kwon Jung-seng lived and a lifelong church where he was a servant. It was in 1968 that he, ill without a family, entered the church doorway. Every day, she pulled the strings, rang the bells, helped with church work, and wrote at night. In the same year, he wrote <Doggy Dog Dung> and he was not satisfied with it. It is cold in winter and sultry doorway in summer, but the teacher wrote many works here. The doorway and bell tower where the teacher stayed changed slightly over the years, but it is enough to bring back the feeling.

Iljik Church Bell Tower. The building on the right is a newly built doorway.
There is a house where the teacher lived under Bilbae Mountain, which is seen from the church. It is a small clay house with no trees, no fences, no names, and a backside of Bilbangi Hill, with two trees. There is a room in the clay house, a kitchen, a toilet and a kennel in the corner of the yard. This small house, about 26 square meters (8 pyeong), was built by a local young man for his teacher, where he lived from 1983 until his death. “It's nice to be warm, quiet, lonely at will, sick, and thought-prone,” he wrote to Lee. Although the roof is curled up in the remotest part of town, it was a perfect place for a teacher who said, "The artist must be lonely."
Kwon Jung-seng's house is small but warm
Kwon Jung-san gave a warm attention to dog poop that everyone deems trivial. This winter would not be cold if we had a book and a passage of his loving love on hand.
I put the name on the paper instead of the nameplate.

Andong, Gyeongbuk, Korea

There were many disasters in Hahoe village. Then one day, the spirit of the village residents Heo-Ryeong dream appears and says, 'If you make 12 masks, the disaster will disappear.' When looking at Hahoe Village, one of Andong's representative hot spots, there are two things that are unfortunate. Hahoe Stars Sin Good Tal Nori is a talol that has been held since the middle of the 12th century in Hahoe Village, Andong, Gyeongbuk. At the same time, it was a village gut to pray for the well-being of the village, Daedong and a good harvest. Residents believed that farming and well-being depended on Dongshin's protection of the village. Bakshingut is a special gut that is held every period to cheer up the gods and free the anger. Hahoe Star Singuthal Play was also a festival to relieve body and mind exhausted from social status and farming.
View of Hahoe Village from the Buyongdae
Desire to wish for goodbye and goodbye
Nature was a powerful entity in agricultural society. This is because life and death have been determined by what happened for a year of farming. It could be said that the peace of the village, including PungNong, depends on nature outside the human realm and on the will of God. Because of this, our ancestors held a ritual that they would like to ask the patron god this year if it is full moon. This is called 'sugar' or 'copper'.
Moodong Madang, where Gaek Clown enters the village via Mudong
Wanting a good harvest to God is the same, but the star Shingut was held at regular intervals. Every 5 to 10 years, or when there was a trust 'byeolsingut' was unfolded. As the name suggests, 'Busin Gut' is the same, in that both Dongje and Byunsin Gut wish for goodbye and good farming. If there is a difference, Star Shin Gut is a large gut plate that is held at regular intervals to solve them when the god's experience of protecting the village is reduced or when God's anger is bought. Byshinshingut was the main character or villagers.
The main character of Baekjeong Yard that entertains the audience.
Another way to enjoy Hahoe Village, Hahoe Stars New Good Play
In the 21st century, the festival and the Hahoe Stars Shin Guktalol, which encompassed the local community in the traditional society, continue to be held. It's also in Andong Hahoe Village where the old and exciting Hahoe Star New Goodtal Play took place! The performance is held four times a week (Wed, Fri, Sat, Sun) until December, and during the weekend from January to February.
Most performances will be like that, but it is best to see Hahoe Stars New Goodal Play. The dwarf, which had been worn by villagers for more than half a century, conveys laughter, satire, and comfort to modern people in the 21st century. Half a century later, the Hahoe Star New Goodal Play is held only once (14:00) on the day of the performance. There are some fluctuations in the high season and low season, so you should check it beforehand. You can catch the line by looking around Hahoe Village in time for the performance. Go up to the Buyongdae, meet the view of Hahoe Village, and slowly take a look around Hahoe Village. Hahoe Village, known as Pungsan Ryu's Village. This space has become famous for its 600-year-old tradition, but the ball of water flowing through the village is large. The name Hahoe came from here. In feng shui geography, it is a softening float, a lotus that floats on the water.
Hahoe Village Yangjindang
Hahoe Village, home to various old houses from the early to late Joseon Dynasty, is still a space where people live. Among the many old houses, the treasures of Hahoe Village, Yangjin-dang (Treasure No. 306) and Ryu Seong-ryong Jong-taek Chung Hyo-dang (Treasure No. 414), where Iam Ryu Jung-young and Ryu Un-yong stayed, are worth a visit.

It's a pity not to forget Byeongsan Seowon, which is located between Hahoe Village and Volcano (271m). Seoae Ryu Seong-ryong's pupils and larvae built a shrine here and became a formal vow. The peaceful stream of water and rock formations overlooking Mandalu is awesome. After receiving the sum of Byeongsan Seowon in 1863, he survived the abolition of Seowon of Heungseondaewon.

Each corner, supported by the incarnation of the Holy Spirit, appears on the shoulders of the mover without stepping on the ground. This scene symbolizes the welcome of the village guardian deity. It has peace and abundance.

Following this, Juji Madang is opened. 'Juji' is a sacred and scary imaginary animal. Female winning means praying for fertility and farming.
Humor and poignant satire
The humor and satire of our ancestors are revealed in earnest from the 'Baekjeong yard', where Baek Chung grabs cows and removes salt shakers and urang (bulbs). Subsequently, Yangban and Seonbi appeared in an argument about the fireball that is 'good for Yang', showing the hypocrisy and pretense of the ruling class.
Monk against Bune
As such, masked dances show the contradictions of society and the hypocrisy of the ruling class. There are scenes of laughter and piercing in the eyes of the 21st-century descendants. At least during the full unfolding of the New Singut would be free regardless of status, gender and wealth. Of course, after the end of the end, you had to go back to your original status, but you might have enjoyed the freedom and blown away the stress for a while.

A world of fullness and equality permitted to the oppressed. This is a Daedong festival and special gut that eased the conflicts and made the village unity. Hundreds of years later, Hahoe Stars New Guttal play is the reason why.

Mandaeru Viewed from Byungsan Seowon Enrollment

Ahem, five senses satisfaction, Goan Andong travel

Andong, Gyeongbuk, Korea

Andong, Gyeongsangbuk-do, is considered one of the first hands in the 'Korean Yangbango'. Known as 'the town of Hahoe Village', Andong is not only a traditional Yangban culture but also a popular folk culture such as Hahoe Mask Dance. Hahoe Village, Byeongsan Seowon, and the Gyeongsangbuk-do Provincial Office, which is nested in Hahoe Village, were added as the representative tourist attractions of Andong. Andong OLD & NEW travel.
Andong, Gyeongbuk. The vague feeling of 'far' may be due to the influence of space-time rather than the actual distance. This is because spaces such as Seowon and Hyanggyo stop at the time, including Hahoe Village in the Nakdong River. Thanks to the traces of our ancestors who enjoyed academics and styles, emphasizing righteousness and courtesy, we thought of Seonbi and Yangban in Andong.
Some ways to travel Yangban
Andong is said to have originated in Changnyeongguk, founded by Yeomsang Dosa in 57 BC. It is called Gotaya-gun and Gochang-gun in Silla era. Afterwards, he entered the Joseon Dynasty and was promoted to Andong-do. Daedohobu is the name of a local administrative agency that was placed in the main town of the Joseon Dynasty. In addition to Andong, it was installed in Gangneung, Pyeongan, Yeongbyeon, and Hamgyeong, Yeongheung. In 1896 (Gojong 33), Andong-gun was passed to Andong-eup in 1931. In 1995, the Andong-gun was merged into Andong-si. This is the reason why it has the largest area among the nation's counties.
Byeongsan Seowon from the side of the entrance hall
Therefore, Andong travel should be considered in consideration of the line. It can be divided into Hahoe Village, which binds Hahoe Village, Byeongsan Seowon, and Gyeongbuk Provincial Offices, Dosan Seowon, which binds Dosan Seowon, Toegye Jongtaek, and Andong City Area, which combines Andong Cultural Tourism Complex, Old Market, and New Market. This trip is a course that combines the Andong-gu market and the new market with a view of Gyeongbuk Provincial Government, Hahoe Village and Dosan Seowon. Of course, one night and two days can be enjoyed in order to taste Andong's special mackerel and hut jesak rice and enjoy Andong Lake's night view.
Hahoe Village Yangjindang
Gyeongsangbuk-do applicants located in Hahoe Village
After entering Andong land, I first went to Gyeongsangbuk-do. The plan is to move to Gyeongsangbuk-do, Governor, Hahoe Village, and Byeongsan Seowon.
New Gyeongsangbuk-do Office of Information Center in Andong
You can stop by Gyeongsangbuk-do on the way to see Hahoe Village and Byeongsan Seowon. The visitor information center appears when you enter Gyeongsangbuk-do, which opened in March 2016.
Main office
Brochures as well as cultural commentators are available. The first floor of all buildings in the Metropolitan Government is open to outsiders.
Semi-circle modeled after Gyeongju Donggung and Wolji
There are buildings such as Gyeongbuk Provincial Council, Gyeongbuk Provincial Office, Welfare Center, and Multi-purpose Performance Hall, Sesimwon, modeled after Gyeongju Donggung Palace and Wolji, Saemaul Square, and Gyeonghwamun.

Andong Travel NO.1 Poongsan Ryu's Zipseong Village Hahoe Village
It is 5.7km from Gyeongsangbuk-do, Gyeonggi-do and Hahoe Village in 10 minutes by car. Hahoe Village, a 600-year-old village of Pungsan Ryu, flows in the 'S' shape with the Nakdong River surrounding the village. This is why the village name became 'Hahoe'. In feng shui geography, it is 'soft softening type' which is considered as the best road. It resembles a lotus floating on water. It is famous for being a good place for people to live in since Joseon Dynasty because there are mountains and rivers centering on villages. In July 2010, it was listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

Byeongsan Seowon is devoted to the study in harmony with nature

The beautiful Seowon, which overlooks the flowing stems of the Nakdong River, began in 1575 when Seo-ae Ryu Sung-ryong moved Pungak Seodang in Pungsan-eup. Ryu Sung-ryong's pupils and larvae set up his shrine here and became a formal vow. It is one of 47 vows and shrines that received the sum of 'Byeongsan' in 1863 and survived the Seowon Abolition of Heungseondaewon.
